title: DAZ3D - Opal for Genesis 3 Female
description:
Opal is a kindly grandmother for Genesis 3 Female.

Opal's textures were made using high-quality photos and lots of time and plenty of love went into creating as realistic a result as possible. She has been rendered in many different sorts of lighting as seen in her promos, but renders well under dramatic lighting to accentuate her wrinkles and skin details.

She has several make-up options, from demure and classy, to bold and clashing.

She also has several natural eye colours, made to be as realistic as possible.

Opal uses custom morphs that work with the Genesis 3 Female Head and Body Morphs to create a unique shape.

What's Included and Features

Opal for Genesis 3 Female (.DUF)
Character Preset
Shaping Presets
Full Apply/Remove
Body Apply/Remove
Head Apply/Remove
Material Options
Base Skin
Anatomical Elements
5 Eye Colors
5 Makeups
Iray Only Settings
Skin Translucency Red
Anatomical Elements Translucency Red
3Delight Only Settings
Sub-surface Scatter 25/50/75
Textures Include:
29 Texture, Bump, Displacement, Specular and Sub-surface Scatter Maps (4096 x 4096)
11 Texture, Bump, Displacement and Transparency Maps (2048 x 2048)
This product uses the Genesis 3 Base Female UV Maps
Daz Studio 3Delight Material Presets (.DUF)
Daz Studio Iray Material Presets (.DUF)
